name: Plant The Tree
description:
A very short 2D platformer where you fight and dodge your way through enemies and obstacles to collect the treasure with a surprise at the end!

Art: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/free-platform-game-assets-...
Music: https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/

All other content that was created and seen in the game is 100% original.
